gov.nih.nlm.ling.composition

Class DependencyClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.composition.DependencyClass

  • public class DependencyClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a higher-level classification of dependencies. A DependencyClass is a triple of a higher-level dependency name, the syntactic categories it applies to, and the corresponding syntactic dependency labels.

    As syntactic dependencies are processed to create a semantic embedding graph, some dependency labels are changed to capture the nature of the semantic dependency more directly.

    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

        public DependencyClass(java.lang.String depClass,
                       java.lang.String category,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> depTypes)
        Creates a dependency mapping.
        Parameters:
        depClass - the label of the higher-level dependency class
        category - the category this mapping applies to ("*" if it applies to all)
        depTypes - the corresponding syntactic dependency labels

      • inClass

        public static boolean inClass(java.lang.String category,
                              java.lang.String dep,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> embedTypes)
        Determines whether a dependency label (dep) belongs in one of the higher-level dependency labels specified in embedTypes, for a given category.
        Parameters:
        category - the category to look for
        dep - the lower-level dependency label
        embedTypes - the higher-level classes
        Returns:
        true if dep belongs

        Parameters:
        mappings - the mappings to filter

        Returns:

      • filterByDepClass

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> filterByDepClass(java.util.List<DependencyClass> mappings,
                                                                java.lang.String category,
                                                                java.lang.String depClass)
        Filters a list dependency mappings by a category and high-level label.
        Parameters:
        mappings - the mappings to filter
        category - the category to filter with
        depClass - the high-level label
        Returns:
        a list of dependency labels in the given category and high-level class, or empty list

      • filterByDepClasses

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> filterByDepClasses(java.util.List<DependencyClass> mappings,
                                                                  java.lang.String category,
                                                                  java.util.Set<java.lang.String> depClasses)
        Similar to #filterByDepClass(List, String, String), but takes as input a set of high-level dependency labels instead of just one.
        Parameters:

        category - the category to filter with
        depClasses - the high-level labels
